title: Aptitude & Logical Reasoning
content:
Quantitative Aptitude

Quantitative aptitude is a key component of placement exams. It tests your ability to solve numerical problems.

Key Topics:

  • Percentages: Formula: (Value / Total) * 100. Important for profit/loss, data interpretation.
  • Profit & Loss: CP (Cost Price), SP (Selling Price). Profit = SP - CP. Loss = CP - SP.
  • Time & Work: If A does work in x days, 1 day work = 1/x.
  • Time, Speed & Distance: Speed = Distance / Time.

Practice Tips:

Focus on mental math and shortcut tricks. Practice at least 20 questions per day.

Logical Reasoning

Tests your analytical and logical thinking capabilities.

  • Blood Relations: Draw family trees to solve meaningful relationships.
  • Series Completion: Look for patterns (arithmetic, geometric, squares, cubes).
  • Seating Arrangement: Linear and Circular arrangements.
